content:
PROPPATCH Method - Implementation

  • Two Commands

    • PROPPATCH supports creating or deleting a property. In order to simplify the implementation and reduce server load there are no facilities to alter part of a property’s value.

  • Batching and Atomicity

    • Multiple create/delete commands may be sent in a single PROPPATCH, all MUST be executed in order and atomically or the entire request MUST be rejected.
